db:abstract.db:para: A QML clock application that demonstrates using a ListView type to display data generated by a ListModel and a SpringAnimation type to animate images.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.14) project(clocks LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON) set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON) set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
